verses.verse: At that time <S%H6256><s%> Merodachbaladan <S%H4757><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baladan <S%H1081><s%>, king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> letters <S%H5612><s%> and a present <S%H4503><s%> to Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%>: for he had heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that he had been sick <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and was recovered <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%> was glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of them, and shewed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them the house <S%H1004><s%> of his precious things <S%H5238><s%>, the silver <S%H3701><s%>, and the gold <S%H2091><s%>, and the spices <S%H1314><s%>, and the precious <S%H2896><s%> ointment <S%H8081><s%>, and all the house <S%H1004><s%> of his armour <S%H3627><s%>, and all that was found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in his treasures <S%H214><s%>: there was nothing <S%H1697><s%> in his house <S%H1004><s%>, nor in all his dominion <S%H4475><s%>, that Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%> shewed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them not.

Then came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yesha`yah-yahu <S%H3470><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> unto king <S%H4428><s%> Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, What said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> these men <S%H582><s%>? and from whence <S%H370><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> they unto thee? And Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, They are come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from a far <S%H7350><s%> country <S%H776><s%> unto me, even from Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> he, What have they seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in thine house <S%H1004><s%>? And Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, All that is in mine house <S%H1004><s%> have they seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: there is nothing <S%H1697><s%> among my treasures <S%H214><s%> that I have not shewed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yesha`yah-yahu <S%H3470><s%> to Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>:

Behold, the days <S%H3117><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, that all that is in thine house <S%H1004><s%>, and that which thy fathers <S%H1><s%> have laid up in store <S%H686><s%> <S%H8804><s%> until this day <S%H3117><s%>, shall be carried <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8738><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%>: nothing <S%H1697><s%> shall be left <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And of thy sons <S%H1121><s%> that shall issue <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from thee, which thou shalt beget <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, shall they take away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and they shall be eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> in the palace <S%H1964><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H2396><s%> to Yesha`yah-yahu <S%H3470><s%>, Good <S%H2896><s%> is the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> which thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>. He said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> moreover, For there shall be peace <S%H7965><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> in my days <S%H3117><s%>.
